summary: Vehicle ownership management app; add a feature for owners to revoke/remove vehicle ownership (e.g., when selling/transferring) with mandatory PIN confirmation, without impacting existing working features.
architectural_notes: Revoke ownership action must require PIN verification/confirmation.
Implement revoke-ownership with minimal changes to existing stable features (avoid regressions).

existing_features.title:
Expose the new backend method to the frontend by updating the generated/type declarations and actor interface used by the React app.

Details:
- Update the frontend backend type declarations (per change-control policy, `frontend/src/backend.d.ts`) to include the new method signature.
- Ensure the frontend actor creation continues to work without changes to the auth/bootstrap flow.

Add a frontend UI flow for owners to revoke vehicle ownership from the Vehicle Detail page, using a PIN prompt.

Details:
- In `frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx`, within the existing "Owner Actions" area, add a new destructive action button labeled "Revoke Ownership".
- Only show the button when:
  - The viewer is the owner (`isOwner`), and
  - The vehicle status is `ACTIVE` (match existing owner-actions gating).
- Clicking the button must require PIN entry using the existing `PinPromptDialog` component.
- If the user does not have a PIN set (use `useHasPIN()`), block the revoke flow and show user-facing guidance in English (e.g., toast "You must set a PIN before revoking ownership") and provide a direct navigation path to `/security`.
- On successful revocation:
  - Show a success toast in English (e.g., "Ownership revoked")
  - Invalidate relevant React Query caches (vehicle detail + user vehicles list)
  - Navigate back to `/vehicles`.
- On failure:
  - Show an error toast in English using the existing error normalization patterns.

Implementation note:
- Add a new React Query mutation hook (e.g., `useRevokeVehicleOwnership`) in `frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts` (or a clearly appropriate existing hook file) that calls the new actor method and handles cache invalidation.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 'revoke vehicle ownership' feature with mandatory PIN confirmation for owner when selling/transferring/removing a vehicle

Add a backend canister method to revoke a vehicleâ€™s ownership, requiring the caller to provide their PIN.

Details:
- Add a new public shared method (e.g., `revokeVehicleOwnership(vehicleId: Text, pin: Text) : async ()`) in `backend/main.mo`.
- Authorization rules:
  - Caller must be authenticated (not anonymous) and have user permission (same guards as other vehicle mutations).
  - Vehicle must exist.
  - Caller must be the current vehicle owner.
  - PIN must be verified using the existing PIN store/verification logic.
- Behavior on success:
  - Update the vehicle record so it is no longer owned by the caller (set `owner` to the anonymous principal `Principal.fromText("2vxsx-fae")`).
  - Clear any existing `transferCode` (set to `null`).
- Error handling:
  - If the user has no PIN set, trap with a clear message (e.g., "No PIN set for this user").
  - If PIN is wrong, trap with a clear message (e.g., "Incorrect PIN").
  - Preserve existing behavior for all other methods (no functional changes).

Note: Do not change the `Vehicle` type schema; implement revocation without introducing new fields/variants to avoid migrations and regressions.

projectName: Add vehicle ownership revocation with mandatory PIN confirmation
